query:
UPDATE best_score
                         SET rating = GREATEST(
                             CASE
                                 WHEN score >= 10000000 THEN ? + 2.0
                                 WHEN score >= 9800000 THEN ? + 1.0 + (score - 9800000) * 5.0 / 1000000.0
                                 ELSE GREATEST(? + (score - 9500000) * 5.0 / 1500000.0, 0.0)
                             END,
                             0.0
                         )
                         WHERE song_id = ? AND difficulty = ?
